key:
(A) 
Question
 41 
 
Group-I gives a list of test methods for evaluating properties of aggregates. Group-II gives the list of 
properties to be evaluated. 
 
Group-I : Test methods 
 
(P) 
Soundness test 
 
(Q) 
Crushing test 
 
(R) 
Los Angeles abrasion test 
 
(S) 
Stripping value test 
 
Group-II : Properties 
 
(1) 
Strength 
 
(2) 
Resistance to weathering 
 
(3) 
Adhesion 
 
(4) 
Hardness 
The correct match of test methods under Group-I to properties Group-II, is  
 
(A) 
P-3; Q-4; R-1; S-2 
 
(B) P-4; Q-1; R-2; S-3 
 
(C) 
P-2; Q-4; R-3; S-1 
 
(D) P-2; Q-1; R-4; S-3 
 
(C)

Question
 40
The planar structure RST shown in the figure is roller-supported at S and pin-supported at R. Members 
RS and ST have uniform flexural rigidity (EI) and S is a rigid joint. Consider only bending deformation 
and neglect effects of self-weight and axial stiffening.
